general_instructions: For requesting task, user needs to provide the preferred food, area, price range or the hotel name directly for choosing a particular hotel. system needs to inform the hotel name, food, price range, address, phone number, postcode when requested.  For booking a table, user needs to inform the booking day, number of people and the booking time. system needs to inform the reference number when booking is successful.
belief_instructions: belief instructions: hotel name = huntingdon marriott hotel, a and b guest house, etc.; pricerange = dont care, cheap, moderate, expensive; area = dont care, centre, east, north, south, west; stars = dont care, 0,1,2,3,4,5; parking = dont care, yes, no; internet = dont care, yes, no; type = hotel, guest house | booking day = monday, tuesday, etc.; people = 1,2,3,4,5,6,etc. ; stay = 1,2,3,4,etc.

replies.system_inform_choices_star_request_area: hotel (inform (choices, star), request(area)) system : there are [value_count] options . is there an area of town that you prefer ?
replies.user_search_hotel_w_price: user : i need find a [value_pricerange] hotel.
replies.system_inform_choices_price_request_area: hotel (inform (choices, pricerange), request(area)) system : there are [value_count] [value_pricerange] hotel -s available . did you have a preference as to area of the hotel ?
replies.user_search_hotel_w_star_pricerange: user : find me a [value_star] hotel on the [value_pricerange] side.
replies.system_inform_name_pricerange_star: hotel (inform (name, pricerange, star)) system : [hotel_name] and [hotel_name] are both [value_pricerange] in the [value_count] star range .
replies.user_ask_reference_num: user: please give me the reference code.
replies.system_inform_booking_w_reference: hotel (booking (name, address), inform (reference)) system : i was able to successfully book you at [hotel_name] . the address is [hotel_address] . the reference number is [hotel_reference].
replies.user_search_hotel_name: user : i am looking for a hotel called [hotel_name].
replies.user_book_info: user: i need rooms for [value_count] people for [value_count] nights, starting [value_day].
replies.system_inform_booking: hotel (booking(name), inform(reference), require (more)) system : you are booked at [hotel_name] with reference number [hotel_reference] . may i help with anything else ? [eos]
replies.system_inform_name_pricerange_star_area_: hotel (inform (name, pricerange, star, area, wifi, parking), require (more)) system : the [hotel_name] is an [value_pricerange] [value_count] star hotel in the [value_area] part of town . they have free wifi and free parking . should i book it ?
replies.system_inform_hotel_name_food_area_price: system : the [hotel_name] serves [value_food] food , is located in the [value_area] part of town and in the [value_pricerange] price range .
replies.system_inform_name_food_area_price_addre: hotel (inform (name, price, food, area, address, postcode, phone)) system : [hotel_name] is a [value_pricerange] [value_food] place in the [value_area] at [hotel_address] [hotel_postcode] . the phone number is [hotel_phone].
replies.system_inform_hotel_price_ask_food: hotel (inform (choices), request (food)) system : [value_place] offers [value_count] [value_pricerange] -ly priced hotel -s . what sort of cuisine would you like ?
replies.system_ask_narrow_food_price: hotel (inform (choices), request (food, price)) system : i have over [value_count] hotel -s to choose from , would you mind narrowing down your search for me with perhaps a food type or price range ?
replies.user_search_hotel_w_price_area: user : i need an [value_price] hotel in the [value_area].
replies.system_inform_choices_ask_area_price: hotel (inform (name, food, area, price), require (more)) system : [hotel_name] serves [value_food] food , is in the [value_area] part of town and in the [value_pricerange] price range . would you like their location ?
replies.system_inform_choices_price_area_ask_foo: hotel (inform (name, food, area)) system : how about [hotel_name] , a nice [value_food] place in the [value_area].
replies.system_inform_hotel_name_price_area: hotel (inform (choices), request (price)) system : there are several hotel -s in the [value_area] part of town . would you like something in the [value_pricerange] , [value_pricerange] or [value_pricerange] price range ?
replies.system_ask_price_food: system : do you have a certain price range or food type you are looking for ?
replies.system_inform_hotel_name_price_food: system : [hotel_name] is a [value_pricerange] -ly priced hotel offering [value_food] cuisine . would you like any other information ?
replies.system_inform_food_area_ask_price: hotel (inform (name, area, price), require(more)) system : [hotel_name] hotel in the [value_area] part of town and in the [value_pricerange] price range . would you like more information for them ?
replies.user_search_hotel_pricerange_star_type: user: i'm looking for a(n) [value_pricerange] [value_count] star hotel/guesthouse.
replies.system_inform_name_internet_parking: hotel (inform (name, internet, parking), require (booking)) system : [hotel_name] is a nice guesthouse/hotel with free internet and free parking included . can i reserve a room for you ?
replies.system_inform_hotel_name_food_area_phone: hotel (inform (name, price, food, area, phone), require (booking)) system : [hotel_name] is an [value_food] hotel in the [value_area] . their phone number is [hotel_phone] . would you like me to make a reservation for you ?
replies.user_ask_area: user : which part of town it is in ?
replies.system_inform_area: hotel (inform (name, area)) system : [hotel_name] is located in the [value_area] part of town
replies.system_inform_address: hotel (inform (name, address)) system: [hotel_name] is located at [hotel_address].
replies.user_ask_phone: user: can i get the phone number?
replies.system_inform_phone: hotel (inform (name, phone), require (more)) system: the [hotel_name]'s phone number is [hotel_phone]. is there anything else i can help with ?
replies.system_inform_postcode: hotel (inform (postcode), require (more)) system: their postcode is [hotel_postcode]. do you need anything else?
replies.system_inform_another: system : there is [hotel_name] if you are looking for a [value_pricerange] hotel .
replies.user_book_table: user : can you book the table for [value_count] people at [value_time] on [value_day] please?
replies.system_inform_booking_successful: hotel (booking (name, day, time), inform (reference)) system : i have made a reservation for you at the [hotel_name] on [value_day] at [value_time] for [value_count] people. your reference number is [hotel_reference].
replies.user_thanks: user: thanks for all your help.
replies.system_ask_more: hotel (require (more)) system : you are welcome . may i help you with anything else ?
replies.user_nomore: user : nope, that covers all my needs. thanks.
replies.system_general_bye: hotel (general (bye)) system : thank you for using our system !
replies.system_bye: hotel (general (bye)) system: you are welcome, and have a great stay.
replies.user_ask_book: user: i want to book the [hotel_name].
replies.system_booking_request_date_stay_people: hotel (request (date, stay, people)) system : no problem. just give me a date , how many days , and how many people to accommodate please !
replies.user_search_hotel_internet: user: can you help me find a guesthouse/hotel with free internet.
replies.system_inform_choices_internet_request_p: hotel (inform (choices, internet) request (pricrange)) system : there are [value_count] hotel -s or guesthouses with free wifi . what price range are you looking for ?
replies.system_inform_pricerange: hotel (inform (pricerange) require (booking)) system : the [hotel_name] is in the [value_pricerange] price range . would you like to book a room ?
replies.user_ask_internet: user : does it include free wifi?
replies.system_inform_internet: hotel (inform (internet), require (booking) yes it does have free internet . would you like me to book it for you ?
replies.user_ask_stars: user: what is the star rating of this guest house / hotel?
replies.system_inform_stars: hotel (inform (star)) system: [hotel_name] is a [value_count] star guest house / hotel.
replies.user_book_stay_day: user: i need a reservation for [value_count] nights starting [value_day].
replies.system_ask_people: hotel (request (people)) system : how many people are in your party ?
replies.user_search_hotel_pricerange_internet_ty: user : i am looking for a hotel/guest house that include free wifi in the [value_pricerange] price range.
replies.system_inform_name_area_pricerange_inter: hotel (inform (name, area, pricerange, internet), request (booking) system : i have [hotel_name] , located in the [value_area] , [value_pricerange] and has wifi . would you like me to make a reservation for you ?
